thread.title: Billy
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Billy

author: Billy
title: Billy
text: My salesperson, Justin, was top notch. He was very helpful and sold me what I wanted. Most sales people try and sell what they need to turn, or what will make them more money. Not Justin. You have a real winner. Prices are great. Quality of furniture is great. This was a pleasant experience.
